page_content: Discusses increased risk of flooding in Kanton Aargau due to weather conditions.
Provides instructions for submitting electronic legal documents, mentions software platforms IncaMail and SuisseID.
Discusses planning tools for urban development, includes PDFs but not related to software.
Discusses scholarships and loans for education in Kanton Aargau, mentions an online portal for applications but not specifically about software.
Discusses the renovation of the VERANA software system used by Aargau municipalities for tax assessment.
